thought: The Slack post action is failing due to missing or incorrect parameters. We need to set the required parameters properly including select, channelId, messageType, and text fields.
plan: Set 'select' to 'channel' to specify sending to a channel.
Set 'channelId' with mode 'name' and value 'general' for the #general channel.
Set 'messageType' to 'text' for simple text messages.
Set 'text' to the message content from input data.
criticism: Currently, the Slack action has empty params, causing execution failure. Proper parameters must be set for the action to work.

tool_input.comments: Send messages to Slack channel #general with classification results, using the text field from input data.
